name: DaniJam2
description:
THERE WAS BLOOD

by Oliver Dettweiler and Marnix Adriaanse

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Once upon a terrible time, there was a witch who gave you a powerful weapon cursed with bloodlust. 

You have 5 lives. When the blood bar fills up, you gain a life, but when it runs out you lose a life. Kill enemies to stay alive and keep your bloodlust satiated.

Use WASD to move and the left mouse button to pull out your sword. Press RMB enter rampage mode. You can use E to kill all enemies, but you will get no blood. Stay alive as long as possible.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The web version is available, but the downloadable executable is recommended, as the web build runs quite poorly for some reason.
